mapper.select: select name, id, email_id, email_domain, join_date, birth, gender, profile_image, (select count(*) from user_follow where id_from = #{id}) following, (select count(*) from user_follow where id_to = #{id}) follower from user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user_follow (id_from, id_to, follow_time) values (#{userId}, #{idTo}, now())
mapper.delete: delete from user_follow where id_from = #{userId} and id_to = #{idTo}
delete from user where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
mapper.select: select * from (select a.id_to id from user_follow a join user_follow b on a.id_to = b.id_from and b.id_to = a.id_from where a.id_from = #{userId}) a join user using(id)
